amendment.description: Amendment ensures a timely review for legal challenges of energy projects on Federal land and limits attorney fees in order to discourage frivolous lawsuits and foster energy production.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in House Report 114-359 to ensure timely review for legal challenges of energy projects on federal land and limits attorney fees in order to discourage frivolous lawsuits and foster energy production.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Gosar.
